reviewText: ofall the K dramas se have watched this is the very best love story~  It a long drama but so down to eath we love it
There are lot of families loves and cares for each other and in the communities too. Very good scripting and acting. Good video quality.
I love this show.  The characters are sweet and well acted.  The story is heartwarming.  Best of all the English subs were excellent.
